paper_abstract: The notion of frame has some generalizations such as frames of subspaces, fusion frames and g-frames. In this paper, we introduce fusion frames and g-frames in Hilbert C*-modules and we show that they share many useful properties with their corresponding notions in Hilbert space. We also generalize a perturbation result in frame theory to g-frames in Hilbert spaces. We also show that tensor product of fusion frames (g-frames) is a fusion frame (g-frame) and tensor product of resolution of identity is a resolution of identity.
paper_title: Fusion frames and g-frames in Hilbert C*-modules
